html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00652023-02-03ECCC, HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectProhibition of the Manufacture and Import of Wheel Weights Containing Lead in Canada Regulations
PrecisPROHIBITION OF THE MANUFACTURE AND IMPORTATION OF WHEEL WEIGHTS CONTAINING LEAD REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the manufacture and import of wheel weights that contain more than 0.1% lead by weight; and (2) allow permit applications for specific use or situation in Canada when there are no alternatives to manufacturing or importing wheel weights containing lead, or the alternatives are not technically or economically feasible for the applicant.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0015 Publication Date: 2023-02-15
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: PROHIBITION OF THE MANUFACTURE AND IMPORTATION OF WHEEL WEIGHTS CONTAINING LEAD REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the manufacture and import of wheel weights that contain more than 0.1% lead by weight; and (2) allow permit applications for specific use or situation in Canada when there are no alternatives to manufacturing or importing wheel weights containing lead, or the alternatives are not technically or economically feasible for the applicant.
